p: Petals of flowers in pre-anthesis and anthesis were fixed in 2.5 % glutaraldehyde in 0.1 M phosphate buffer, pH 7.3 for 24 h at 4 Â°C. They were post-fixed in 1 % osmium tetroxide in the same buffer for 1 h at room temperature, dehydrated in an acetone dilution series and embedded in Araldite resin ( Machado and Rodrigues 2004). Ultrathin sections were obtained with a diamond knife and counterstained with uranyl acetate (Merck KGaA) ( Watson 1958) and lead citrate (Merck KGaA) ( Reynolds 1963). The material was observed with a Tecnai G2 Spirit Bio TWIN transmission electron microscope (FEI Company, Hillsboro, OR, USA).
